channel.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
channel.description:
Ok i know i am a noob ;D
But how do i change a server client to a certain ip? It says username..password...then no ip slot.

item.title: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

If its an editable server, scroll down to EGUI.java and edit it there. If there is just EGUI.class, then you’re screwed and new an IP-Changer client :S

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change a server client to a certain ip?
